projects.name: Maintainer - A Car Management App
projects.description: An app for managing car maintenance records, service history, and reminders. Features include user authentication, service tracking, and analytics dashboard.
projects.tech_stack: Next.js • Tailwind CSS • Node.js • Express.js • MongoDB

projects.name: AI Meeting Notes Bot
projects.description: A bot that joins meetings, transcribes audio, and generates summarized notes.
projects.tech_stack: Python • Selenium • Whisper AI • Gemini API

projects.name: InstruRentals
projects.description: An online platform for renting musical instruments with user authentication and payment integration.
projects.tech_stack: React.js • MongoDB • Express.js • Node.js • Tailwind CSS • Redux • Razorpay

projects.name: Eksodi - CI/CD Deployment Manager
projects.description: A lightweight CI/CD deployment manager for Docker, Kubernetes, and cloud VMs.
projects.tech_stack: Next.js • Tailwind CSS • Node.js • PostgreSQL • Redis • Docker • Kubernetes • GitHub Actions • Prometheus • Grafana

projects.name: Library Management System
projects.description: A full-stack system for managing book issuance and tracking returns, with a dashboard UI.
projects.tech_stack: Next.js • Express.js • MySQL • Docker • Nginx • Tailwind CSS • AWS EC2 • Github Actions
